availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John D. S. Gardner (Calloway County, KY, farmer and prov govt conv rep )

body.p: Calloway County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of William Gardner and Frances Gardner. Member of farming family in Calloway County in 1850. Family owned two enslaved persons in Calloway County in 1850. Member of the convention of the provisional government held at Russellville in November 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Calloway County, District 2, p. 444B.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Calloway County, District 2, pp. 5-6 of microfilm.
Find A Grave, "John David Gardner (1835-1898)," Memorial 13676590, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/13676590 (accessed November 22, 2019).
KYR-0004-033-0001.
